svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-09-09T19:28:37.201Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/21.6.8 Chrome/114.0.5735.289 Electron/25.5.0 Safari/537.36" etag="Us952uwBrqC6dVW-BZNB" version="21.6.8" type="device"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="N6YDBZaDRXJ6djt8uoPq"> <mxGraphModel dx="2074" dy="1188" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="827" background="#ffffff" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-6" value="USB 5V" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-1" target="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-1" value="Powerbank" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="310" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-3" value="Charge USB" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-2" target="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-2" value="Sam" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="310" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-11" value="5V" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-5" target="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-16" value="GPIO" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-15" target="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-18" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-17" target="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-19" value="Data" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-5" target="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-5" value="Adafruit Feather<br>HUZZAH32 ESP32" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="450" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-10" value="LCD 20x4 display" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="590" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-15" value="Die Selector<br>(7 buttons)" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="450" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nJsbVnnqbmLibnUtrgPl-17" value="Incremental Encoder<br>n-selector" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="450" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
